description: Handles user checkout and payment processing

objectives.name: high_http_availability
objectives.description: Maintain at least 99.9% HTTP request success rate.

objectives.name: low_latency_p95
objectives.description: Ensure 95% of HTTP requests complete within 300ms.

explanation: SLOs were selected to protect core aspects of the checkout experience. A 99.9% availability target ensures high uptime. A 95th percentile latency objective captures tail performance while remaining achievable. The checkout error rate is limited to <1% to ensure transactional reliability. A 30-day window was chosen for a balanced observability and reliability horizon.
